# Oita Prefectural College of Arts and Culture

|type           = Public
|president      = Kingo Nakayama
|city           = Ōita
|state          = Ōita
|country        = Japan
|undergrad      =
|postgrad       =

|website        = [http://www.oita-pjc.ac.jp/ Official website]
}}
is a public junior college in Ōita, Ōita Prefecture, Japan, established in 1961. The university has departments in art, music, global studies, and information and communication.
